title: JamesBorn
author: JamesBorn
content: Am sorry if this is not allow here. Am just happy to share my joy with you, growing alone was hard experience I went through when I loss my parents at the age of two. I encounters many challenges with my little sister, mom leaves behind at childbirth. But today am grateful to God who saw me through the hurdles of life, give me a new family and lovely two girls. That's why I decided to always dedicate my birthdays celebrations with them. Am super excited to witness today in 365 days of good health and life. Please join and wish me well, this forum is another of my family am grateful to you all. Happy Birthdays to me and family.Happy many returns to me.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: Congratulations. Many happy returns, and many more kids.

comments.author: Raceonsucced
comments.body: Congratulations OP I hope you and your family will always be blessed with abundant blessings, convenience, happiness and fortune. It must be very difficult to get through all the obstacles that you went through a long time ago. I'm happy to see you happy üòÅ To all the members in this forum too, I hope we are all always happy and always successful.

comments.author: Lorence.xD
comments.body: Quote from: JamesBorn on March 15, 2023, 03:07:46 PMAm sorry if this is not allow here. Am just happy to share my joy with you, growing alone was hard experience I went through when I loss my parents at the age of two. I encounters many challenges with my little sister, mom leaves behind at childbirth. But today am grateful to God who saw me through the hurdles of life, give me a new family and lovely two girls. That's why I decided to always dedicate my birthdays celebrations with them. Am super excited to witness today in 365 days of good health and life. Please join and wish me well, this forum is another of my family am grateful to you all. Happy Birthdays to me and family.Happy many returns to me.First of all, congratulations to you. Hope your family will have a healthy year and more blessings to come. It must be hard to lose your parents in a very young age, but I like how you overcome those challenges in life and gave you the happiness you deserve. We spread love and support here and forum in any successful experiences in life. God bless

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: I am late but Happy Birthday to you JamesBorn. I am sorry about the sad things that happened in your earlier life.You are a true credit & an inspiration to all those around you. I see your two kids in the photo, I am sure they love you very much & you are a great Father.Just continue being a great Father to your kids. Your parents would be so proud of you. Keep doing what you do!
